ygData.subject: Re: Correction
ygData.msgSnippet: No inconvenience, Dcoburn. Its a fairly common error people make. ... Astral spins around as a pod lands somewhere behind him. He takes off toward it at a run,

No inconvenience, Dcoburn. Its a fairly common error people make.

::Astral::

Astral spins around as a pod lands somewhere behind him. He takes off 
toward it at a run, soon seeing the new bot.

"Hey," he yells to the new bot, "You friend or foe?"

Astral slowly approaches, hand on his rifle.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> OOC: Ok, I've been informed by Yanshosh that my post needs a little 
correction.  Just say that Composer landed on shore, but didn't see 
the Alliance base, and then one of the Alliance can notice him or 
sumtin.  Sorry for any inconvience this may have caused!
